content: I think I'll take a closer look at my pilot study results and see how I can effectively report them in my thesis. Thanks for the advice! By the way, I've been thinking about my research objectives and I'm wondering if you can help me with something. I remember staying up late for many nights in February, trying to finalize my research questions and objectives. Do you have any advice on how to ensure my research objectives are specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART)?
